[h1]Dead by Daylight[/h1]

Acorda em um local estranho, confuso, assustado, você quer tentar sair dali, mas para isso terá que energizar seu único meio de saída. Você nunca estará sozinho, sempre terá alguma companhia ao seu lado para te ajudar, mas entre essas companhias estará um predador cujo estará babando para se deliciar com o seu sangue, corra e corra muito pela sua vida, se não quiser ser morto pela luz do dia... Este é o seu papel como sobrevivente.

Você não tem limites, não tem leis que o impeçam, ninguém pode te parar, cace-os tal faz um leão atrás de uma zebra em grupos, o sangue deles é o que te enchem de poder, de satisfação e prazer, use os meios necessários para pegar sua preciosa carne e a colocar no seu devido gancho para o abate. Querendo ou não, você não terá muita escolha, pois o que te colocou ali o obrigará a punir aqueles julgados pecadores no plano terreno... Este é seu papel como assassino.

Gameplay asymétrique très complet avec une bonne variété de personnage et de compétence. 
Mais peut être frustrant dans le côté très compétitif à haut SBMM (Skill Based MatchMaking). 

Je recommande fortement de le commencer avec au moins un ami qui connais bien les subtilité très complexe du gameplay. 

Et évidemment bien plus fun à 4

I like to play mostly killer and i am currently in the lower silver ranks. Simply because progressing any further is very tough for me. I see more red ranks in my game than players of my own rank. I love the game and it is a lot of fun espacially with friends. But playing normal online lobbys against players that always tryhard because I assume they expect a killer of their rank is just not fun for me. My friend that just started the game had the same issue. And that was his second or third game. If you want to pick up the game it is best played with friends. But you will have to learn a lot and you will be punished for everything that you dont know. Have fun : )

Surviver（Rank赤帯1）
マッチングどうにかなりませんか。
サバイバー側で野良プレイしていると連携が取りにくく、高スキルプレイやー（Killer）に当たれば簡単に全滅しかねません。
レートなるものでプレイヤースキルを内部計算してマッチ組んでいるとのことですが、適正だとは思えないことがあります。
また、そのレートにはアイテムアドオンは計算に入っていないのです。（ちょっと信じられません）
結果、負けが混むことがありストレスフルです。
チェイスで長くKillerを引っ張たり、隠密で翻弄することで、楽しみを見出すことも出来ますが、その技術や知識の習得には長い時間と経験が必要になるでしょう。
その覚悟がある方は新規でも参入しても良いと思います。
そして、チームで組むことが出来る人はその方が絶対にお勧めです。
あと、煽りプレイヤーは死ぬほどダサい。自分から周りに自身の品性が最低であることを示しているようなものです。止めましょう。

Whether or not you enjoy this game depends on how you approach it. If you just want to show up and 'win' or 'pwn' the other side, you're going to eventually have a terrible time and ragequit. If you want to hang out with friends, enjoy tactical thinking, and occasionally like breaking the game by playing it in fun ways that it was never intended to be played, you'll find a really great community to get involved with. There's definitely toxicity around (it's everywhere), but DBD has some of the least toxic people here, or maybe I'm just finding them all. Or both. If you do want to play with people, I suggest finding the smaller Twitch streamers who have an energy that you like, and hang out in their channels - I jumped into the game on a free weekend, and within six months I've now got a host of friends to play the game with, including quite a few killers I encountered along the way. 

At the end of the day though, you really do get out of this game what you put in. I don't know if I'll ever 'get good', but then, I'm not actually sure I want to. The game might become unplayable if I tried to grind up the MMR league

Worst, toxic community ever. You can be the most fair killer ever, never tunnel, never slug, never camp. And still, you get rude comments every few games. And it gets much, much worse if you do anything that the community deemed as "unfair", even if it's just game mechanics (noed). I don't personally care what these people say, but this should absolutely be pointed out. If you are sensitive to such behaviour and want to play killer, then disable your profile comments.

The game itself is quite fun though!

I've played this game for around 1000 hours, which is a ridiculous amount of time that I have sunk into this game. I used to love it, and play it every single night, having over 40 hours a week every week, despite working full time. But now, it has lost it's charm. Whether its the NFTs, the loop ending killers, the extreme W holding gaming, or anything else, its just not the same. But I hope if you enjoy this game you continue to find joy, and new player can still pick this up and love it. But I feel that those who have played this for a while cannot help reminisce upon the past DBD. But, there is a lot of fun portions to the game so I can say nothing but you have to try it yourself! 

Just to be clear I'm not hating on people who like it, I actually think its an alright game, I just miss the old DBD so much that its hard to play the "newer" one.
